column17:
Formals are not boring anymore. Club this ravishing formal shirt in white colour with your pencil skirts or well fitted trousers and get the perfect formal look. The frill detailing on the neckline lends it a stylish look.

Features
  • Fabric: Chiffon
  • Colour: White
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Front: Buttoned placket
  • Sleeves: Full Sleeves

Looks great with well fitted trouser or pencil skirts.

Care Tips
Wash with like colours.
Do not soak tumble dry or bleach
Mild iron
Line dryNote:There may be a slight colour variation in the image from original product.
